value.title: Add multiple missing columns if missing in Power Query
value.excerpt: In todays video I am going to show you how to add missing columns if they are missing in Power Query so your queries wont break.  Link to the resource: https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/87affbc4-364f-470a-80ee-c35d32f1d331/is-there-a-way-to-add-a-column-only-if-it-doesnt-already-exist?forum=powerquery

value.title: Analyze and visualize your Outlook/Exchange calendar in Power BI

In todays video I will show you how to import your calendar from Outlook into Power BI and show you one way to visualize it.  Link

value.title: DAX Fridays! #14: SUMMARIZE

The function SUMMARIZE can return a summary of sales grouped around the calendar year and the product category name, this result table allows you to do analysis over the reseller sales by year and product category.  Source:https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg492171.aspx
